page.title: MOEA Framework credits
page.description: List of contributors to the MOEA Framework

content.p: Special thanks to the following individuals and projects for their open source contributions that are used by this project and website.

ul.li: Website template adapted from the CoolBlue template by styleshout (CC Attribution 2.5)
Icons from the Nuvola theme (GNU LGPL)
Icons from the FAMFAMFAM Silk icon set (CC Attribution 2.5)
JQuery and Fancybox for displaying popup boxes (MIT License)
See the README and LICENSE files distributed with the MOEA Framework for source code contributions.
